Ability.Name: Holy Light
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 92 and PQR_IsMoving(1) == false and PQR_IsCastingSpell(635) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: Divine Light
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 66 and PQR_IsMoving(1) == false and PQR_IsCastingSpell(82326) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: Flash of Light
Ability.Lua:
local Infusion = UnitBuffID("player", 54149)
if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 37 and PQR_IsMoving(1) == false and PQR_IsCastingSpell(19750) == false then return true elseif PQR_CustomTargetHP < 70 and PQR_IsMoving(.1) and Infusion ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Autotarget Low HP
Ability.Lua:
if UnitExists("target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and UnitCanCooperate("player","target") then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
else
PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() lowhpmembers = 0 local lowest = 100
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = 100 * UnitHealth(member) / UnitHealthMax(member) if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then memberhp = memberhp - 1 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if UnitBuffID(member, 53563) == nil then memberhp = memberhp + 4 end if memberhp < 95 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < lowest then PQR_CustomTarget = member lowest = memberhp PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth(PQR_CustomTarget) / UnitHealthMax(PQR_CustomTarget) end end end
end

Ability.Name: Seal of Insight
Ability.Lua:
local SoI = UnitBuffID("player", 20165)
if SoI == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Don't Dismount
Ability.Lua: if IsMounted() then return true end

Ability.Name: AutoStopCasting
Judgement
Ability.Lua:
local CCdebuff = { 118, 28272, 61305, 61721, 61780, 28271, 1499, 19503, 90337, 82676, 5782, 6770, 2094, 49203, 19386, 64044, 3355, 82691, 33395, 339 } for i, v in ipairs(CCdebuff) do if UnitDebuffID("target", v) then return false end end
local SoI = UnitBuffID("player", 20165) local SoJ = UnitBuffID("player", 20164) local SoR = UnitBuffID("player", 20154) local SoT = UnitBuffID("player", 31801) local JotP1, _, _, _, _, _, judgeexpire1 = UnitBuffID("player", 53655) local JotP2, _, _, _, _, _, judgeexpire2 = UnitBuffID("player", 53656) local JotP3, _, _, _, _, _, judgeexpire3 = UnitBuffID("player", 53657) local inRange = IsSpellInRange("Judgement", "target") local myMana = 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player")
if UnitCanAttack("player", "target") and inRange == 1 then if (SoR ~= nil or SoT ~= nil or SoJ ~= nil or SoI ~= nil) and JotP1== nil and JotP2 == nil and JotP3 == nil then return true elseif JotP1 ~= nil then judgeexpire1 = (judgeexpire1 - GetTime()) if judgeexpire1 < 5 then return true end elseif JotP2 ~= nil then judgeexpire2 = (judgeexpire2 - GetTime()) if judgeexpire2 < 5 then return true end elseif JotP3 ~= nil then judgeexpire3 = (judgeexpire3 - GetTime()) if judgeexpire3 < 5 then return true end end end

Ability.Name: Word of Glory
Ability.Lua:
local myHolyPower = UnitPower("player", 9)
if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 80 and myHolyPower == 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: Holy Shock
Ability.Lua:
local isEnemy = UnitIsEnemy("player", "target") local myHolyPower = UnitPower("player", 9)
if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 94 and myHolyPower <= 2 then return true elseif isEnemy then CastSpellByID(20473, "target") end

Ability.Name: Divine Plea
Ability.Lua:
local myMana = 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player")
if myMana < 75 then return true end

Ability.Name: Avenging Wrath
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 40 then return true end

Ability.Name: Divine Favor
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 35 then return true end

Ability.Name: Turn Undead
Ability.Lua:
local TU = UnitDebuffID("focus", 19725) local HW = UnitDebuffID("focus", 2812) local hasFocus = UnitExists("focus") local type= UnitCreatureType("focus") local Meta = UnitBuffID("focus", 59672)
if hasFocus ~= nil then if type == "Undead" or type == "Demon" or Meta ~= nil then if TU == nil and HW == nil then return true end end end

Ability.Name: Holy Wrath
Ability.Lua:
local TU = UnitDebuffID("focus", 19725) local HW = UnitDebuffID("focus", 2812) local hasFocus = UnitExists("focus") local type= UnitCreatureType("focus") local Meta = UnitBuffID("focus", 59672)
if hasFocus ~= nil then if type == "Undead" or type == "Demon" or type == "Elemental" or Meta ~= nil then if TU == nil and HW == nil then if CheckInteractDistance("focus", 3) == 1 then return true end end end end

Ability.Name: Holy Radiance
Ability.Lua:
local myMana = 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") local HR = UnitBuffID("player", 82327)
if lowhpmembers >= 3 and myMana >10 and PQR_IsMoving(1) == false and HR == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Divine Shield
Ability.Lua:
local myHealth = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local HordeFlag = UnitBuffID("player", 23333)
if myHealth < 20 and HordeFlag == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Divine Protection
Ability.Lua:
local myHealth = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")
if myHealth < 39 then return true end

Ability.Name: Cleanse
Ability.Lua: if not DontDispel(PQR_CustomTarget) then local i = 1 local buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(PQR_CustomTarget, i) while buff do if (bufftype == "Magic" or bufftype == "Poison" or bufftype == "Disease") and duration > 6 and count ~= 1 and UnitIsFriend("player",PQR_CustomTarget) then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(PQR_CustomTarget, i) end end

Ability.Name: BoM
Ability.Lua:
local BoK = UnitBuffID("player", 20217) local BoM = UnitBuffID("player", 19740)
if BoK == nil and BoM == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: SelfBeacon
Ability.Lua:
local Beacon = UnitBuffID("player", 53563, "PLAYER")
if Beacon == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 30 then return true end

Ability.Name: Cleanse Old
Ability.Lua:
function CheckMagic(unitid) local i = 1 local buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(unitid, i) while buff do if bufftype == "Magic" or bufftype == "Poison" or bufftype == "Disease" then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(unitid, i) end end
local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if PQR_CustomTargetHP > 88 then if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsCharmed(member) == nil and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil and PQR_IsOutOfSight(member) == false then if CheckMagic(member) then PQR_CustomTarget = member end end end
if CheckMagic(PQR_CustomTarget) and (not UnitDebuffID(PQR_CustomTarget,30108) or not UnitDebuffID(PQR_CustomTarget,34941)) then return true end if CheckMagic("player") and (not UnitDebuffID("player", 30108) or not UnitDebuffID("player",34941)) then PQR_CustomTarget = "player" return true end end

Ability.Name: Aura
BoK
Ability.Lua:
local BoK = UnitBuffID("player", 20217) local BoM = UnitBuffID("player", 19740) local MotW = UnitBuffID("player", 1126)
if BoK == nil and BoM == nil and MotW == nil then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not AuraOn then AuraResistance = 0
AuraOn = 1 end

Ability.Name: Crusader Strike
Ability.Lua:
local inRange = IsSpellInRange("Crusader Strike", "target") local isEnemy = UnitIsEnemy("player", "target")
if PQR_CustomTargetHP > 80 and isEnemy and inRange == 1 then return true end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not AuraOn then AuraResistance = 0
AuraOn = 1 end

Ability.Name: AT Smart Low HP
Ability.Lua:
if not healinit then
function CalculateHP(t) local incomingheal = 0 if UnitGetIncomingHeals(t) then incomingheal = UnitGetIncomingHeals(t) end return 100 * ( UnitHealth(t) + incomingheal ) / UnitHealthMax(t) end
function SafeTarget(t) if IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(635)),t) == 1 and UnitIsCharmed(t) == nil and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) == nil and UnitCanCooperate("player",t) and PQR_IsOutOfSight(t) == false then return true end end
healinit = true
end
if SafeTarget("target") then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = CalculateHP("target") else lowhpmembers = 0 PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = CalculateHP("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() local targethp = CalculateHP("player") + 20 if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = CalculateHP(member) if SafeTarget(member) then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" and UnitBuffID(member, 53563) == nil then memberhp = memberhp - 1 else memberhp = memberhp + 3 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if memberhp < 88 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < targethp then PQR_CustomTarget = member targethp = memberhp PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth(PQR_CustomTarget) / UnitHealthMax(PQR_CustomTarget) end
end end
end
if CalculateHP("player") < CalculateHP(PQR_CustomTarget) then PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not AuraOn then AuraResistance = 0
AuraOn = 1 end

Ability.Name: -- Bubba Functions
Ability.Lua:
if not functions then function RaidSize() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then local RSize = GetNumRaidMembers() else local RSize = GetNumPartyMembers() end local numNeeded = 0 if RSize <= 5 then numNeeded = 0 return numNeeded elseif RSize <= 10 then numNeeded = 1 return numNeeded elseif RSize <= 25 then numNeeded = 2 return numNeeded elseif RSize >= 20 then numNeeded = 3 return numNeeded end end
function CCdebuff(t) local CCs = { 118, 28272, 61305, 61721, 61780, 28271, 1499, 19503, 90337, 82676, 5782, 6770, 2094, 49203, 19386, 64044, 3355, 82691, 33395, 339 } local hasCC = 0 for i, v in ipairs(CCs) do if UnitDebuffID(t, v) then hasCC = 1 end end
return hasCC end
functions = 1 end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not AuraOn then AuraResistance = 0
AuraOn = 1 end

Ability.Name: --- Onya HR Targeting
Ability.Lua:
hrtargethealth = 90 hrsecondaryhealth = 90 hrsecondarytargets = 5 hrrange = 10
if not onyainit then print("loading libraries")
function onyaGetPlayerMapPosition(unit) local x,y = GetPlayerMapPosition(unit) return x,y end
function NewScaleFactor(unit1,dist) local x1,y1 = onyaGetPlayerMapPosition(unit1) local x2,y2 = onyaGetPlayerMapPosition("player") local xx= x1 - x2 local yy = y1 -y2 sft = tostring (dist/sqrt(((xx) * (xx)) + (((yy) * 0.6666666666666) ^ 2))) return sft end
function DistanceBetweenUnits(unit1,unit2) if unit2 == unit1 then return 0 end local x1,y1 = onyaGetPlayerMapPosition(unit1) local x2,y2 = onyaGetPlayerMapPosition(unit2) if x1 == 0 and y1 == 0 and x2 ==0 and y2 == 0 then return 0 end return (sqrt((((x2 - x1) * sf) ^ 2) + (((y2 - y1) * sf / 1.5) ^ 2))) end
function IsInRange(u1,u2) local range = DistanceBetweenUnits(member[u1].name,member[u2].name) if range <= hrrange then return true end end
function getDefHealth(unit) return (100 - member[unit].health) end
function sortDefHealth(aUnit, anotherUnit) return getDefHealth(aUnit) > getDefHealth(anotherUnit) end
function findGoodTarget() if table.maxn(hrtargets) ~=0 and table.maxn(hrsecondary) >= hrsecondarytargets then table.sort(hrtargets, sortDefHealth) table.sort(hrsecondary, sortDefHealth) for x = 1, table.maxn(hrtargets) do local inrangecount = 0 for y = 1, table.maxn(hrsecondary) do if IsInRange(hrtargets[x],hrsecondary[y]) then inrangecount = inrangecount + 1 end if inrangecount == hrsecondarytargets then return member[hrtargets[x]].name end end end end end
onyainit = true end
local currentmap = GetMapInfo() local currentlevel = tostring(GetCurrentMapDungeonLevel()) or "0" local grp = "party" local mems = GetNumPartyMembers() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then grp = "raid" mems = GetNumRaidMembers() end
if (sfm ~= currentmap) or (sfl ~= currentlevel) then sf = 6000 sfm = currentmap sfl = currentlevel end
for mmm = 1, mems do local checktarget = grp..tostring(mmm) local range = DistanceBetweenUnits("player",checktarget) if (range > 28) and (CheckInteractDistance(checktarget,1)) then sf = NewScaleFactor(checktarget,28) end if (range > 11.11) and (CheckInteractDistance(checktarget,2)) then sf = NewScaleFactor(checktarget,11.11) end if (range > 9.9) and (CheckInteractDistance(checktarget,3)) then sf = NewScaleFactor(checktarget,9.9) end if (range > 40) and (UnitInRange(checktarget)) then sf = NewScaleFactor(checktarget,40) end end
hrtargets = {} hrsecondary = {} member = {}
for i = 0, mems, 1 do member[i] = {} if i==0 then member[i].name = "player" else member[i].name = grp..tostring(i) end local memberin = UnitGetIncomingHeals(member[i].name) or 0 member[i].health= 100 * (UnitHealth(member[i].name)+ memberin ) / UnitHealthMax(member[i].name) if not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member[i].name) then if member[i].health < hrtargethealth and not (UnitBuffID(member[i].name, 82327)) and IsSpellInRange("Holy Radiance", member[i].name) then table.insert(hrtargets,i) end if member[i].health < hrsecondaryhealth then table.insert(hrsecondary,i) end end end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not AuraOn then AuraResistance = 0
AuraOn = 1 end

Ability.Name: Holy Radiance Onya
Ability.Lua:
local _, _, _, cost = GetSpellInfo(82327) local mana = UnitPower("player") local spell = UnitCastingInfo("player")
if mana > cost and spell ~= GetSpellInfo(82327) then local HRtarget = findGoodTarget() if HRtarget ~= nil then PQR_CustomTarget = HRtarget return true end end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not AuraOn then AuraResistance = 0
AuraOn = 1 end
